鄐鄐鄐

鄐字的基本解释

鄐
chù
古邑名，中国春秋时属晋，约在今河北省邢台市附近。
姓。

鄐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chù］
［《廣韻》丑六切，入屋，徹。］
［《廣韻》許竹切，入屋，曉。］
(1)春秋晋邑。在今河南省温县附近。
(2)姓。汉有东海太守鄐熙。见宋洪迈《容斋五笔·风俗通》。

鄐字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄐； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1275第18
【唐韻】丑六切【集韻】敕六切，?音畜。【說文】晉郉侯邑。【左傳·襄二十六年】雍子奔晉，晉人與之鄐。　又姓。【廣韻】漢東海太守鄐熙。　又【廣韻】許竹切【集韻】許六切，?音蓄。又【廣韻】【集韻】?丘六切，音麯。義?同。

鄐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鄐字的起名意思

暂无。

鄐
Basic explanation of words
鄐
chù
The name of the ancient town, which belonged to Jin in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, was approximately near Xingtai City, Hebei Province.
name.
鄐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chù］
["Guangyun" ugly six cuts, enter the house, thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" Xu Zhuqie, enter the house, Xiao. ]
(1) Jinyi in the Spring and Autumn Period. Near Wen County, Henan Province today.
(2) Last name. In the Han Dynasty, there was Hua Xi, the prefect of the East China Sea. See Song Hongmai's "Rongzhai Wubi · Customs".
鄐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄐; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1275 Page 18
【Tang Yun】Ugly six-cut 【Jiyun】Evil six-cut, sound animal. [Said Wen] Jin Xun Hou Yi. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-sixth Year of Xiang] Yongzi went to Jin, and the people of Jin followed it.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Huaxi, the prefect of the East China Sea of the Han Dynasty.　[Guangyun] Xu Zhuqie [Jiyun] Xu Liuqie, sound storage. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qiu Liuqie, music. Righteous? Same.
鄐

Name meaning
Nothing.
chù
собств.
1) ист., геогр. Чу (город княжества Цзинь эпохи Чуньцю)
2) Чу (фамилия)
